text:
My parents emigrated with
me from Honduras to Houston

in order to build a
better life for us.

Inspired by their
mission, my life's purpose

is to build better
lives for others.

More tactically, I want to
build climate technology

solutions that can enable us to
live cleaner, more sustainable

lives while tackling
humanity's toughest challenge--

is no stranger to the damaging
effects of climate change.

Just in my lifetime, I've seen
multiple hurricanes and floods

In order to ensure this
doesn't happen again

and to decarbonize
society, it's going

I believe business can
be a force for good

in the transition to a
decarbonized society.

My life's purpose is to play
a part in that transition,

bettering the lives for
others along the way.
